definition.text: The Crypto Ecosystem hierarchy is where you configure which exchanges and markets you work with, your accounts with exchanges, API keys, and so on...

paragraphs.text: Talking about API Keys, when you create your Exchange API key at the exchange, consider the following:
Exclusive for Superalgos: Create a key to use excusively with Superalgos. This will help you track what Superalgos does with your account and prevent conflicts with other bots you may be using.
No IP Restrictions: This is to avoid issues while doing the tutorial â€” you may add restrictions later, once you know how the system works.
No Withdrawals: Superalgos does not yet handle funds transfers so there is no point in allowing withdrawals. Remove withdrawals for safety reasons.
